alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 10:58AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:35 AM CST Monday the stage was 2.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:35 AM CST Monday was 2.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 2.3 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 2.0 Mon 10 am CS 1.8 1.7 1.8 &&
